Literature.Title: Antibacterial activity of ultrashort cationic lipo-beta-peptides.
Literature.Author: Serrano GN, Zhanel GG, Schweizer F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 27270(MIC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli CAN-ICU 61714(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli CAN-ICU 63074(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=64µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=64µg/ml)
